text: Jisas sɨhinda ambami, Narɨ ŋgandara. Got Mosesɨŋ ambahi, narɨŋandɨ nañɨŋgitakɨñaŋ ambami, Kru mumɨŋga, mumɨŋgandu tamɨŋga mɨŋasɨpɨrɨti ŋgata kɨmbɨ ndahara nuŋandɨ tamɨŋga handahara mɨŋasɨpɨram. Sɨwɨmañanzihɨ kru mumɨŋga, mumɨŋgandu mɨkahɨrɨs ha yɨvukuvɨti ŋgata, kɨmbɨ ndahara nuŋandɨ mɨkahɨrɨs ha yɨvukuvɨm, vamba ambami.
